title: GANSO! BanG Dream Chan
synopsis:
BanG Dream Chan — who took the world of girl bands by storm — is back!?

A poppy, cute, all-star gathering of band members, an avant-garde, laugh-out-loud girl band comedy full of charm!

"Come join us, BanG Dream Chan  — you're BanG Dream Chan, and so am I!"

GANSO! BanG Dream Chan is a new mini Anime series for BanG Dream!, featuring members of the ten bands from BanG Dream!.

(Source: Official Bang Dream! Website)
